description:
Do you love pizza? Are you interested in learning how to make pizzas that everyone will love?

What about stretching yourself, and making some unique and flavoursome pies?

Sure, pizza can be viewed as simple – pedestrian even. And if you stick to making the average lifeless dish, it can be.

But in this course, you'll learn how to make an array of pizzas that will have everyone singing your praises:

  • Classic family favorites - like American, Hawaiian and Meat Lovers'
  • Healthier options - including Vegetarian and Gluten Free
  • Gourmet Pizzas
  • Child-Friendly Pizzas
  • and even Dessert Pizzas

The course has been set up into separate modules (each running for 5-10 minutes each) and comes with an accompanying e-book for easy reference.

It’s designed for people who love cooking…or see it as an outlet for their creativity.
title: 34 Delicious Pizza Recipes & Cooking Videos
